banter_text: "Woah, did you see that? Just dropped a legendary sword from the last boss! I'm talking rarity, top-tier stats... this is an epic find for level 75 players like us! We're going to be unstoppable with this baby in our hands!"
variations: "Woah, did you just get that rare item drop?! I'm talking legendary loot! That epic sword is gonna make me OP overnight! "

"Dude, did you see that rare item drop? I'm talking legendary quality, level of sick! We're literally on a roll at level 75 - this epic loot is what separates the pros from the casuals! You ready to gear up and take on the next raid?"
